section.title: Description
section.p: The process of using a sigmoidoscope called also proctosigmoidoscopy sig moid o scop ic /-d&amp;-'sk p-ik/ adjective [Source: Merriam-Webster's Medical Dictionary, 2002 Merriam-Webster, Inc.]

stentry.p: The date of the diagnostic test SIGMOIDOSCOPY.
Indicates the results of the diagnostic test SIGMOIDOSCOPY. Possoble values are Not done; Positive; Negative; Unknown/not documented; etc.
